ingredients.name: Flour
ingredients.description: All-purpose wheat flour, used as a base for most pastries.

ingredients.name: Sugar
ingredients.description: Granulated white sugar for sweetening recipes.

ingredients.name: Powdered Sugar
ingredients.description: Finely ground sugar, also known as confectioners' sugar, used for icing and dusting.

ingredients.name: Butter
ingredients.description: Unsalted butter, adds richness and flavor.

ingredients.name: Eggs
ingredients.description: Chicken eggs, used for binding and leavening.

ingredients.name: Milk
ingredients.description: Whole milk, adds moisture and richness.

ingredients.name: Yeast
ingredients.description: Active dry yeast, used for leavening dough.

ingredients.name: Baking Powder
ingredients.description: Chemical leavening agent for quick breads and cakes.

ingredients.name: Baking Soda
ingredients.description: Sodium bicarbonate, a chemical leavening agent for baked goods.

ingredients.name: Cocoa Powder
ingredients.description: Unsweetened cocoa powder for chocolate flavor.
